A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This particular sermon is unlikely to convert anyone to the Church of Jedi.   As best I can tell there were lots of preachers yelling about goodness and light and lecturing on fire and brimstone - all backed with the appropriate visuals.  Most of the other dialogue made literally no sense to me and I had no idea where anyone was at any given time or why they were going where-ever they were going.
